titleStmt.title: At a Common-Council holden at the Guild-hall London, on VVednesday the 23 day of November 1659.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
Alleyne, Thomas, Sir, fl. 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Flesher Printer to the honourable City of London,

notesStmt.note: An order of the Common Council appointing the 2nd of December to be kept as a Fast Day.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
